thread.section_title: Firmoo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Firmoo | www.firmoo.com
thread.title: Morgan Elizabeth

author: Morgan Elizabeth
title: Morgan Elizabeth
text: I ordered two pairs of glasses from Firmoo. I messed up on my prescription. When I emailed Firmoo and told them what happened, they were willing to help me. They replaced my glasses for free. I now have glasses that I can see out of and that look great on me! I'm definitely getting new glasses from here again!! I have already told my friends about this website and they absolutely love it!
